title: Noches de Fuego

banner_image.name: Orange artwork with man and woman feet dancing
banner_image.alt: Orange artwork with man and woman feet dancing

description: Candelatino presents Noches de Fuego every Thursday in Prospect Lounge. Get into the groove with free salsa dancing lessons from 8-9pm then mix and mingle with guests from 9-11pm while enjoying your favorite wine and cocktails.
short_description: Candelatino presents Noches de Fuego every Thursday in Prospect Lounge. Get into the groove with free salsa dancing lessons from 8-9pm then mix and mingle with guests from 9-11pm while enjoying your favorite wine and cocktails.
